channel.title: Under the Bonnet: Standard Tuning Issues
channel.description:
[This document](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lj5VQ2M1zzQ4uZ8cQZrzPGCC0JR7uckZUkUSpwElrYc/edit#) contains a number of problems, issues and suggestions for tuning the Standard. They primarily involve small changes to the existing Standard content rather than adding anything new. Points are roughly grouped by type of problem / suggested addition, though are currently very mixed in terms of severity / impact.
There are also a number of issues logged directly against the SSOT under [Schemas](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Schemas/issues), [Rulesets](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Rulesets/issues) and [Extra Documentation](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Extra-Documentation/issues). These are generally small issues relating to documentation content. If any of these issues impact interpretation or use of the Standard, a note should be made on Github to copy them into this document.
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1lj5VQ2M1zzQ4uZ8cQZrzPGCC0JR7uckZUkUSpwElrYc

item.title: Under the Bonnet: Standard Tuning Issues
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.description:
The Org Standard (v2.02 - Definitions, Rules, Attributes) has now been read through in detail. Several issues have been created on Github relating to this.

Read full topic
item.source: Under the Bonnet: Standard Tuning Issues

item.title: Under the Bonnet: Standard Tuning Issues
item.dc:creator: hayfield
item.description:
Note: At present, the Activity Standard has been reviewed in detail (v2.02 was read through). It is intended to read through the Org Standard in detail shortly, and a post made on here once this has been completed - Update: See post below.

Read full topic
item.source: Under the Bonnet: Standard Tuning Issues
